author: Anna Medaris Miller and Gabby Landsverk
title: How you can safely spend time outside while under a 'stay at home' or 'shelter in place' mandate
description: As the novel coronavirus pandemic spreads across the US, cities and states are taking measures ranging from encouraging social distancing to ordering residents to "shelter in place" in order to better control the spread. But confusion about what the various t…
content: First, workplaces started making working from home optional. Then restaurants and bars reduced capacity, before closing entirely for in-house dining. Schools shut down, nonessential businesses closed, and quickly, cities began issuing orders for people to sta… [+4287 chars]
